author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Combine the sugar with three tablespoons of water and heat on a low heat until the sugar dissolves.  Remove from the heat and allow to cool.   Once cool, place the sugar in a blender with the cherries, lime juice, tequila, cherry liqueur or Cointreau, and the ice. Blend until smooth, and serve in martini glasses with a sugared rim.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz caster sugar,  175g/6¼oz cherries, stemmed and stoned,  4 tbsp lime juice,  150ml/5¼fl oz tequila,  3 tbsp cherry liqueur or Cointreau,  275ml/10fl oz ice
